A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I throughly enjoyed the movie\, but my 9 year old son loved the movie. Almost 40 years after I saw a New Hope when released in the U.K. I got to see what it must have been like for me. That made this a 5* movie for me. \nIgnore the sour puss detractors whose heads are stuck where the sun doesn't shine. Enjoy this well crafted storyline with excellent performances with sets that aren't all green screen.
